::Feline::

She smiled at him,"Forgive me.  I'm Feline.  How do you do?"
She extended her hand for him to shake.


::KitKat:: 
She was low on energy and couldn't heal on it's own.
She heard Drillbit's voice, somewhere in the back of her mind. She 
didn't want to leave him. 

Her body trembled, even in stasis lock.  She wasn't going to make it 
much longer. 




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He looked into Feline's eyes, as he sipped his drink. She was 
beutiful,
> but there was something about her, something dark. He desmissed the
> thought.
> "So tell me about yourself." He thought a sec.
> "I dont even know your name."
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Phobia! Her life signes are failing, she's dieing!"
> He crateled her in his arms.
> "Dont you die! You cant! Come on, your stronger then this, fight, 
fight
> for your life, my love! There is still something I want to say to 
you."
> He put her down, and started doing what he could, to save her.
